mapper.select: /* [chn.bhmc.dms.crm.cso.service.dao.IdccRoleMgmtDAO.selectIdccRoleMgmtsByConditionCnt] */ SELECT COUNT(T1.USR_ID) AS VALUE FROM ( SELECT T2.USR_ID ,T2.USR_NM ,T2.EMP_NO ,T2.DLR_CD FROM CM_0810T T1 INNER JOIN CM_0801T T2 ON T1.REF_ID = T2.USR_ID WHERE T1.VIEW_ID = 'VIEW-D-10322' AND T1.SYS_CD = 'D' AND T1.REF_TP = 'U' AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T2.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND T2.DEL_YN = 'N' ) T1

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.crm.cso.service.dao.IdccRoleMgmtDAO.selectIdccRoleMgmtsByRole] */ SELECT T0.* FROM ( SELECT T1.DLR_CD ,T1.USR_ID ,T2.REMARK ,DECODE(T2.REMARK,'',T1.USR_NM, T1.USR_NM||' ('||T2.REMARK||')' ) AS USR_NM ,T1.REG_USR_ID ,T1.REG_DT ,T1.UPDT_USR_ID ,T1.UPDT_DT FROM ( SELECT T2.USR_ID, T2.USR_NM, T2.EMP_NO, T2.DLR_CD, T2.REG_USR_ID, T2.REG_DT, T2.UPDT_USR_ID, T2.UPDT_DT FROM CM_0803T T1 INNER JOIN CM_0801T T2 ON T1.REF_ID = T2.USR_ID WHERE T1.ROLE_ID = #{sRoleId} AND T1.REF_TP = 'U' AND T2.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND T2.DEL_YN = 'N' UNION SELECT T3.USR_ID, T3.USR_NM, T3.EMP_NO, T3.DLR_CD, T3.REG_USR_ID, T3.REG_DT, T3.UPDT_USR_ID, T3.UPDT_DT FROM CM_0803T T1 INNER JOIN CM_2801T T2 ON T1.REF_ID = T2.TSK_CD INNER JOIN CM_0801T T3 ON T2.TSK_CD = T3.TSK_CD WHERE T1.ROLE_ID = #{sRoleId} AND T1.REF_TP = 'T' AND T2.CMP_TP = '10' AND T3.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND T3.DEL_YN = 'N' ) T1
) T0
